CustomField.formula:
If ( Product_Sub_Family__c = 'Soluno',
IF( ISPICKVAL ( SKU_Product__r.Pricing_Type__c , "Monthly"), 12, 1) * IF( ISPICKVAL ( SKU_Product__r.Revenue_Type__c, "Recurring"),1,0) * ( (Qty__c * Total_All_Tier_Per_User__c ) - IF( AND ( Short_Term_Discount__c > 0, ISPICKVAL( Short_Term_Promotion__r.Discount_Type__c, "Short-Term"), OR( AND( ISPICKVAL ( SKU_Product__r.Pricing_Type__c ,"Monthly"),Promotional_Discount_Duration__c >= 12), AND( ISPICKVAL ( SKU_Product__r.Pricing_Type__c ,"Annual"), Promotional_Discount_Duration__c >= 1 ))), (Qty__c * Total_All_Tier_Per_User__c * Short_Term_Discount__c), IF(Lifetime_Discount__c > 0,(Qty__c * Total_All_Tier_Per_User__c * Lifetime_Discount__c),0)) ) ,
IF( ISPICKVAL ( SKU_Product__r.Pricing_Type__c , "Monthly"), 12, 1) * IF( ISPICKVAL ( SKU_Product__r.Revenue_Type__c, "Recurring"),1,0) * ( (Qty__c * Price_Base__c) - IF( AND ( Short_Term_Discount__c > 0, ISPICKVAL( Short_Term_Promotion__r.Discount_Type__c, "Short-Term"), OR( AND( ISPICKVAL ( SKU_Product__r.Pricing_Type__c ,"Monthly"),Promotional_Discount_Duration__c >= 12), AND( ISPICKVAL ( SKU_Product__r.Pricing_Type__c ,"Annual"), Promotional_Discount_Duration__c >= 1 ))), (Qty__c * Price_Base__c * Short_Term_Discount__c), IF(Lifetime_Discount__c > 0,(Qty__c * Price_Base__c * Lifetime_Discount__c),0)) ) )
